Text saved: It is helpful to know that people can have different expectations and behaviour. This can help us avoid problems when we communicate. However, it is very important to remember that cultural stereotypes can be bad for building good business relationships. Stereotypes are simple but often untrue ideas about what a group of people is like.

National culture can affect how we behave and think. But many other things also influence us. These include the region we come from, the communities we are part of, our age and gender, and our company's culture. Our own personal experiences are also important. Therefore, we should remember these possible differences. But we should not use this knowledge to judge all the people from an entire nation.
